task.title: Viewing objects
task.shortdesc: How you view files in CWRC depends on the file itself. XML documents are viewed in the visualization tool CWRC-Writer. Image, audio, video, and document files open within your browser. For more information see Content Models Reference.

step.cmd: Open the collection that has the item you would like to view.

step.info: The images below show two different way you can view files in CWRC. The first is an XML file shown in CWRC-Writer. The second is a video file displayed within its CWRC file page.
